article_title: American kids see the dentist more than adults
article_text:
UT Health Dental School student volunteers provide a free dental screening on a child as part of Colgate's Oral Health Month,in Houston. (Photo by Aaron M. Sprecher/Invision for Colgate/AP Images)

How often do Americans go to the dentist?

Most do go, but many don't go frequently enough and there remains a stubborn minority that doesn't go at all for a variety of reasons.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Jack Craver
article_metadata.description: Children go to the dentist more frequently than adults, a study shows.

Most do go, but many don't go frequently enough and there remains a stubborn minority that doesn't go at all for a variety of reasons.
